description.value:
Age. A khemri reaches adulthood in their early 20s and generally lives into their second century.

Creature Type. You are a Humanoid. You are also considered a goblinoid for any prerequisite or effect that requires you to be a goblinoid.

Size. You are Medium.

Speed. Your Speed is 30 feet.

Darkvision. You have Darkvision to a range of 60 feet.

Honor Clad. You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice, and your choice of proficiency with two martial weapons or with light armor.

Saving Face. Khemri are careful not to show weakness in front of their allies, for fear of losing honor. If you fail a D20 Test, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Stubborn Disposition. You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] or &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition on yourself.

Vigilant. You can use this trait to take the Help action as a Bonus Action, and you can do so a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

When you reach character level 3, choose one of the options below each time you take the Help action with this trait:

Passage. You and the creature you help each increase your Speeds by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

Overbear. Until the start of your next turn, the first time the creature you help hits a target with an attack roll, that target has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes within the next minute.

Refuge. You and the creature you help each gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to 1d6 plus your Proficiency Bonus.

When you reach character level 5, you increase the range of this special Help action to 30 feet.
